info.name: Social Media API
info.description:
This API provides functionality for user authentication, profile management, interaction, including Google authentication and managing user relationships like follow.

The endpoints allow for operations such as signing up, logging in, logging out and updating user profile image, and managing social connections like following other users.

It is designed with seassion based authentication.

item.name: Authentication

request.description: Initiates Google federated authentication using Passport.js. Redirects the user to Google's login page for authentication
Handles the callback from Google after the user has authenticated. Verifies the authentication and redirects the user accordingly
Handles the callback from Google after the user has authenticated. Verifies the authentication and redirects the user accordingly

response.name: Login

item.description: Session based authentication with PassportJS,Google federated login and callback or bearer token.

item.description:
Users folder handles routes like:

- getting profile, all users, user by username
    
- creating new user, following user
    
- updating profile picture or bio

item.description:
Posts folder is responsible of handling routes like:

- getting all posts, all posts for visitor, all posts for logged in user or all posts by user id
    
- creating new post, liking post
    
- updating post
    
- deleting post or unlike

item.name: Comments
item.description:
- get all comments for post
    
- create new post
